verses.roman:
jala-krīḍā kari' punaḥ āilā udyāne
bhojana-līlā kailā prabhu lañā bhakta-gaṇe

synonyms: jala-krīḍā—sporting in the water; kari'-performing; punaḥ—again; āilā—came; udyāne—in the garden; bhojana-līlā—pastimes of accepting prasāda; kailā—performed; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā bhakta-gaṇe—with all the devotees.
translation: After sporting in the water, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned to the garden and accepted prasāda with the devotees.
